zh-tw.window_title: Sid遊戲工具 v1.0.5 - 血魔監控 + 一鍵清包 + 自動化工具
zh-tw.adjust_colors_main_title: 調整血量顏色檢測參數
zh-tw.red_hsv_explanation:
🔴 紅色HSV參數 控制低血量紅色像素的檢測靈敏度
• 顏色鮮豔度: 值越低 = 檢測更暗淡的紅色，越高 = 只檢測鮮豔紅色
• 顏色明亮度: 值越低 = 檢測更暗的紅色，越高 = 只檢測明亮的紅色
• 建議範圍: 鮮豔度50-150，明亮度50-150
• 適用於: 適應不同遊戲畫面亮度和對比度
zh-tw.green_hsv_explanation:
🟢 綠色HSV參數 控制健康狀態綠色像素的檢測靈敏度
• 顏色鮮豔度: 值越低 = 檢測更暗淡的綠色，越高 = 只檢測鮮豔綠色
• 顏色明亮度: 值越低 = 檢測更暗的綠色，越高 = 只檢測明亮的綠色
• 建議範圍: 鮮豔度50-150，明亮度50-150
• 適用於: 適應不同遊戲畫面亮度和對比度
zh-tw.histogram_threshold_title: 顏色分布相似度門檻值
zh-tw.ssim_explanation:
📊 SSIM (圖片相似度) 評估圖片的整體結構相似度
• 值越接近1.0 = 檢測越嚴格 (只接受高度相似的圖片)
• 值越接近0.0 = 檢測越寬鬆 (允許更多結構變化)
• 推薦範圍: 0.85-0.95 (平衡靈活性和準確性)
• 適用於: 檢測UI元素位置和佈局變化
zh-tw.histogram_explanation:
📈 顏色分布相似度 比較圖片的顏色分佈特徵
• 值越接近1.0 = 檢測越嚴格 (要求顏色分佈高度相似)
• 值越接近0.0 = 檢測越寬鬆 (允許顏色分佈較大差異)
• 推薦範圍: 0.90-0.98 (適合大多數UI檢測場景)
• 適用於: 檢測整體色彩風格和亮度變化
zh-tw.color_diff_explanation:
🎨 顏色差異 測量RGB顏色通道的平均差異值
• 值越小 = 檢測越嚴格 (要求顏色高度相似)
• 值越大 = 檢測越寬鬆 (允許較大顏色變化)
• 推薦範圍: 20-60 (依據圖片品質和照明條件調整)
• 適用於: 檢測細微的顏色變化或照明差異
zh-tw.reset_completed_message: 已重置為預設值，請點擊「應用設定」來儲存
zh-tw.health_threshold_range_error: 健康比例門檻值必須在 0.0-1.0 之間
zh-tw.red_h_range_error: 紅色H範圍必須在 0-20 之間
zh-tw.green_h_range_error: 綠色H範圍必須在 30-90 之間
zh-tw.red_saturation_range_error: 紅色最小鮮豔度必須在 50-255 之間
zh-tw.red_value_range_error: 紅色最小明亮度必須在 50-255 之間
zh-tw.green_saturation_range_error: 綠色最小鮮豔度必須在 50-255 之間
zh-tw.green_value_range_error: 綠色最小明亮度必須在 50-255 之間
zh-tw.color_threshold_empty: 顏色差異閾值不能為空
zh-tw.mse_invalid_number: MSE閾值必須是有效的數字
zh-tw.ssim_invalid_number: SSIM閾值必須是有效的數字
zh-tw.histogram_invalid_number: 直方圖閾值必須是有效的數字
zh-tw.color_invalid_number: 顏色差異閾值必須是有效的數字
zh-tw.histogram_range_error: 直方圖閾值必須在 0.0-1.0 之間
zh-tw.color_range_error: 顏色差異閾值必須在 5-100 之間
zh-tw.health_pixel_ratio_explanation:
🏥 健康像素比例門檻值 決定區域血量顏色檢測的敏感度
• 值越接近1.0 = 檢測越嚴格 (區域需有更多血量顏色才算"有血量")
• 值越接近0.0 = 檢測越寬鬆 (區域只需少量血量顏色就算"有血量")
• 建議範圍: 0.2-0.5 (依據血量條設計和遊戲調整)
• 適用於: 判斷血量條的每個小區域是否包含血量顏色
zh-tw.red_h_range_explanation:
🔴 紅色H範圍 (顏色種類) 定義紅色顏色的最大範圍上限
• 值越小 = 紅色顏色範圍較窄 (只檢測特定紅色)，檢測更精確
• 值越大 = 紅色顏色範圍較寬，包含更多種紅色變化
• 建議範圍: 0-20 (標準紅色範圍)
• 適用於: 低血量時的紅色血量條檢測
zh-tw.green_h_range_explanation:
🟢 綠色H範圍 (顏色種類) 定義血量條健康時的綠色顏色範圍
• 值越小 = 檢測偏黃的綠色調
• 值越大 = 檢測偏藍的綠色調
• 建議範圍: 30-90 (標準綠色範圍)
• 適用於: 健康狀態時的綠色血量條檢測
zh-tw.reminder_text: 請在遊戲設定介面中勾選「隱藏生命/魔力保留」選項。

zh-tw.test_window_title: 這是設定視窗 (中間層級)
zh-tw.poe_sid_tools_title: 🎮 Path of Exile Sid 遊戲工具
zh-tw.opensource_subtitle: 完全開源免費版 | GNU AGPL v3
zh-tw.video_recommendation: 💡 建議先觀看影片快速了解工具功能和設定！
zh-tw.health_monitor_desc:
• 即時監控血量和魔力條
• 自訂觸發百分比門檻
• 自動執行設定的快捷鍵
• 支援冷卻控制
zh-tw.smart_inventory_desc:
• 一鍵清除所有背包物品
• 記錄背包UI參考顏色
• 右鍵按住2秒緊急中斷
• 支援任意背包大小
zh-tw.skill_combo_desc:
• 設定觸發鍵和技能序列
• 支援1-5個技能連段
• 可調整延遲時間
• 同時啟用多個套組
zh-tw.automation_tools_desc:
• F6一鍵取物 (5個座標)
• CTRL+左鍵自動連點
• F5快速返回藏身處
• 全域暫停功能
zh-tw.version_info_text:
🆔 當前版本：{version}
📅 更新日期：2025年9月
👨‍💻 開發者：Sid
📧 聯絡方式：GitHub Issues

✅ 所有功能完全免費
🔓 無任何使用限制
🛡️ 開源透明可信賴
zh-tw.quickstart_text:
⚡ 3分鐘快速設定：

1️ 選擇遊戲視窗
2️ 框選血量條區域
3️ 設定觸發條件
4️ 啟動監控系統

🎮 開始享受自動化遊戲體驗！
zh-tw.setup_guide_text:
🔧 血魔監控設定：
1. 選擇遊戲視窗
2. 點擊"框選血量條"
3. 拖拽選擇血量條區域
4. 設定觸發條件
5. 啟動監控

📦 清包功能設定：
1. 點擊"框選背包UI"
2. 選擇背包區域
3. 記錄淨空顏色基準
4. 使用F3開始清包

⚙️ 連段系統設定：
1. 選擇觸發鍵
2. 設定技能序列
3. 調整延遲時間
4. 啟用所需套組
zh-tw.notes_text:
• 確保遊戲視窗處於前台時使用功能效果最佳
• 框選區域時請精確選擇，避免包含干擾元素
• 建議在安全環境下測試設定是否正確
• 技能連段延遲建議設定在300-1000毫秒之間
• 所有設定會自動儲存，下次啟動時自動載入
• 本工具完全開源免費，如遇收費版本請勿購買
• 使用過程中如有問題，請前往GitHub提交Issue
zh-tw.license_text: GNU AGPL v3 - 完全免費開源

zh-tw.about_subtitle: 完全開源免費版 | GNU AGPL v3
zh-tw.status_display: ✅ 狀態: 完全免費開源
zh-tw.support_text:
如果這個工具對您有幫助，
歡迎支持開發者繼續維護和改進！
zh-tw.disclaimer_text:
本軟體是免費開源的。如果你被收費，請立即退款。請造訪 GitHub 下載最新的官方版本。

本軟體僅供個人使用，用於學習 Python 程式設計、電腦視覺、UI 自動化等技術。請勿將其用於任何營利性或商業用途。

使用本軟體可能會導致帳號被封。請在了解風險後再使用。

zh-tw.load_config_failed:
載入設定失敗
請重新設定
zh-tw.skill_combo_usage_content:
1. 設定觸發技能：選擇一個按鍵作為連段的觸發鍵
2. 設定連段技能：選擇1-5個技能按鍵作為連段序列
3. 設定延遲時間：每個連段之間的延遲時間（毫秒）
4. 啟用套組：勾選要使用的連段套組
5. 啟動系統：點擊"啟動連段系統"開始監聽觸發鍵

💡 提示：
• 支援的按鍵：QWERTYUIOPASDFGHJKLZXCVBNM1234567890
• 延遲時間建議：100-500毫秒
• 可以同時啟用多個套組
• 系統會在背景運行，不影響其他操作

⚠️ 重要提醒：
• 觸發鍵會同時發送到遊戲和觸發連段功能
• 如果勾選"原地攻擊"，技能將以 Shift+技能鍵 的方式執行
• 在遊戲聊天時使用觸發鍵會輸入英文字，這是無法避免的
• 建議在聊天時使用 F9 暫停功能避免意外觸發

zh-tw.setup_f6_pickup_coordinates_description: 一次性連續設定5個取物座標
zh-tw.setup_f6_pickup_instructions:
操作說明：
1. 點擊「開始連續設定」按鈕
2. 將滑鼠移動到第1個取物位置，按 Enter 確認
3. 依序設定第2、3、4、5個位置
4. 設定完畢後自動儲存並可測試
zh-tw.start_setup_message:
即將開始連續設定5個取物座標

操作方式：
1. 將滑鼠移動到取物位置
2. 按 Enter 鍵確認該座標
3. 重複5次

💡 提示：隨時按 ESC 鍵可以取消設定

點擊確定開始...
zh-tw.setup_coordinate_hint:
請將滑鼠移動到第 {number} 個取物位置
然後按 Enter 鍵確認

按 ESC 鍵取消設定
zh-tw.setup_completed_message:
已成功設定 5 個取物座標！

座標已自動儲存，現在可以使用 F6 鍵進行一鍵取物。

zh-tw.mse_explanation:
MSE (均方誤差) 測量圖片像素差異的平均值
• 值越小 = 檢測越嚴格 (要求像素高度相似)
• 值越大 = 檢測越寬鬆 (允許較大像素差異)
• 推薦範圍: 100-2000 (依據圖片品質調整)
• 適用於: 檢測細微的像素變化

右鍵或按ESC取消

en.window_title: Sid Game Tools v1.0.5 - Health Monitor + Auto Clear Inventory + Automation Tools
en.red_hsv_explanation:
🔴 Red HSV Parameters control low health red pixel detection sensitivity
• Saturation: Lower value = detect darker red, Higher value = detect only vivid red
• Brightness: Lower value = detect darker red, Higher value = detect only bright red
• Recommended range: Saturation 50-150, Brightness 50-150
• Used for: Adapting to different game screen brightness and contrast
en.green_hsv_explanation:
🟢 Green HSV Parameters control healthy state green pixel detection sensitivity
• Saturation: Lower value = detect darker green, Higher value = detect only vivid green
• Brightness: Lower value = detect darker green, Higher value = detect only bright green
• Recommended range: Saturation 50-150, Brightness 50-150
• Used for: Adapting to different game screen brightness and contrast
en.ssim_explanation:
📊 SSIM (Image Similarity) evaluates overall structural similarity of images
• Closer to 1.0 = stricter detection (accepts only highly similar images)
• Closer to 0.0 = looser detection (allows more structural variation)
• Recommended range: 0.85-0.95 (balance flexibility and accuracy)
• Used for: Detecting UI element position and layout changes
en.histogram_explanation:
📈 Color Distribution Similarity compares color distribution features of images
• Closer to 1.0 = stricter detection (requires highly similar color distribution)
• Closer to 0.0 = looser detection (allows larger color distribution differences)
• Recommended range: 0.90-0.98 (suitable for most UI detection scenarios)
• Used for: Detecting overall color style and brightness changes
en.color_diff_explanation:
🎨 Color Difference measures average difference of RGB color channels
• Smaller value = stricter detection (requires highly similar colors)
• Larger value = looser detection (allows greater color variation)
• Recommended range: 20-60 (adjust based on image quality and lighting conditions)
• Used for: Detecting subtle color changes or lighting differences
en.reset_completed_message: Reset to default values, please click 'Apply Settings' to save
en.red_h_range_error: Red H range must be between 0-20
en.green_h_range_error: Green H range must be between 30-90
en.red_saturation_range_error: Red minimum saturation must be between 50-255
en.red_value_range_error: Red minimum brightness must be between 50-255
en.green_saturation_range_error: Green minimum saturation must be between 50-255
en.green_value_range_error: Green minimum brightness must be between 50-255
en.color_threshold_empty: Color difference threshold cannot be empty
en.mse_invalid_number: MSE threshold must be a valid number
en.ssim_invalid_number: SSIM threshold must be a valid number
en.histogram_invalid_number: Histogram threshold must be a valid number
en.color_invalid_number: Color difference threshold must be a valid number
en.color_range_error: Color difference threshold must be between 5-100
en.health_pixel_ratio_explanation:
🏥 Health Pixel Ratio Threshold determines the sensitivity of regional health color detection
• Closer to 1.0 = stricter detection (region needs more health color to be considered "has health")
• Closer to 0.0 = looser detection (region only needs a small amount of health color to be considered "has health")
• Recommended range: 0.2-0.5 (adjust based on health bar design and game)
• Used for: determining whether each small area of the health bar contains health color
en.red_h_range_explanation:
🔴 Red H Range (Color Type) defines the maximum upper limit of red color range
• Smaller value = narrower red color range (detects only specific red), more precise detection
• Larger value = wider red color range, includes more red color variations
• Recommended range: 0-20 (standard red range)
• Used for: red health bar detection when health is low
en.green_h_range_explanation:
🟢 Green H Range (Color Type) defines the green color range when health bar is healthy
• Smaller value = detects yellowish green tones
• Larger value = detects bluish green tones
• Recommended range: 30-90 (standard green range)
• Used for: green health bar detection when in healthy state
en.reminder_text: Please check 'Hide Life/Mana Reservation' option in the game settings interface.

en.select_mana_region_first: Please select mana bar region first

en.hotkey_info: Hotkeys: F3 Clear Inventory | F5 Hideout | F6 Pickup Items | F9 Global Pause | F10 Health Monitor Toggle

en.game_window_regained_focus: Game window regained focus, monitoring resumed

en.global_pause_deactivated: F9 pressed - Global pause deactivated, restoring functions
en.multiple_triggers: Multiple triggers (allow multiple settings to trigger simultaneously)
en.test_window_title: This is a settings window (middle level)
en.poe_sid_tools_title: 🎮 Path of Exile Sid Game Tools
en.opensource_subtitle: Fully Open Source Free Version | GNU AGPL v3
en.video_recommendation: 💡 It is recommended to watch the video first to quickly understand the tool functions and settings!
en.health_monitor_desc:
• Real-time monitoring of health and mana bars
• Custom trigger percentage thresholds
• Automatic execution of set hotkeys
• Support for cooldown control
en.smart_inventory_desc:
• One-click clear all inventory items
• Record inventory UI reference colors
• Right-click for 2 seconds to emergency interrupt
• Support for any inventory size
en.skill_combo_desc:
• Set trigger keys and skill sequences
• Support 1-5 skill combos
• Adjustable delay time
• Enable multiple sets simultaneously
en.automation_tools_desc:
• F6 one-click pickup (5 coordinates)
• CTRL+Left click auto rapid click
• F5 quick return to hideout
• Global pause function
en.version_info_text:
🆔 Current Version: {version}
📅 Update Date: September 2025
👨‍💻 Developer: Sid
📧 Contact: GitHub Issues

✅ All features are completely free
🔓 No usage restrictions
🛡️ Open source and trustworthy
en.quickstart_text:
⚡ 3-Minute Quick Setup:

1️ Select game window
2️ Select health bar region
3️ Set trigger conditions
4️ Start monitoring system

🎮 Start enjoying automated gaming experience!
en.setup_guide_text:
🔧 Health Monitor Setup:
1. Select game window
2. Click "Select Health Bar"
3. Drag to select health bar region
4. Set trigger conditions
5. Start monitoring

📦 Clear Inventory Setup:
1. Click "Select Inventory UI"
2. Select inventory region
3. Record empty color reference
4. Use F3 to start clearing

⚙️ Combo System Setup:
1. Select trigger key
2. Set skill sequence
3. Adjust delay time
4. Enable required sets
en.notes_text:
• Ensure the game window is in the foreground for best function performance
• Please select regions precisely to avoid interference elements
• It is recommended to test settings in a safe environment
• Skill combo delay is recommended to be set between 300-1000 milliseconds
• All settings will be automatically saved and loaded on next startup
• This tool is completely open source and free, do not purchase if you encounter paid versions
• If you encounter problems during use, please submit an Issue on GitHub
en.license_text: GNU AGPL v3 - Completely Free and Open Source

en.disclaimer_text:
This software is free and open source. If you were charged for it, please request an immediate refund. Please visit GitHub to download the latest official version.

This software is for personal use only, intended for learning Python programming, computer vision, UI automation and other technologies. Do not use it for any commercial or profit-making purposes.

Using this software may result in account bans. Please use it after understanding the risks.

en.dynamic_size_calc_failed: Dynamic tab size calculation failed, using default:
en.window_size_suitable: Current window size already suitable for '{tab_name}' tab, no adjustment needed
en.skill_combo_usage_content:
1. Set trigger skill: Select a key as the combo trigger key
2. Set combo skills: Select 1-5 skill keys as combo sequence
3. Set delay time: Delay time between each combo (milliseconds)
4. Enable set: Check sets to use
5. Start system: Click "Start Combo System" to start monitoring trigger key

💡 Tips:
• Supported keys: QWERTYUIOPASDFGHJKLZXCVBNM1234567890
• Delay time suggestion: 100-500 milliseconds
• Multiple sets can be enabled simultaneously
• System runs in background without affecting other operations

⚠️ Important Notes:
• Trigger key will be sent to both game and combo function
• If "Stationary Attack" is checked, skills will be executed as Shift+Skill
• Using trigger key in game chat will input English letters, which cannot be avoided
• It is recommended to use F9 pause function during chat to avoid accidental triggering

en.setup_f6_pickup_instructions:
Instructions:
1. Click "Start Continuous Setup" button
2. Move mouse to the 1st pickup location, press Enter to confirm
3. Set the 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th positions in sequence
4. Auto-save after setup completion and ready for testing
en.start_setup_message:
About to start setting 5 pickup coordinates continuously

Instructions:
1. Move mouse to pickup location
2. Press Enter key to confirm coordinate
3. Repeat 5 times

💡 Tip: Press ESC key anytime to cancel setup

Click OK to start...
